entry.title: Ensuring Polyphase Properties of Vision Transformers

link.title: Ensuring Polyphase Properties of Vision Transformers

entry.summary: For my undergraduate research, I worked on ensuring the polyphase property of the Vision Transformer. While some components of the transformer were polyphase, others were not. By making the remaining components polyphase, we may be able to make these vision models more robust to adversarial inputs.

entry.title: Comparing Various Deep Learning Techniques for Image Classification

link.title: Comparing Various Deep Learning Techniques for Image Classification

entry.summary:
For my data science class’ final project, I chose to compare the performance of different deep learning architectures on the classic MNIST dataset. In the project, I used a convolutional neural network and a dense network.
View it here
